title: Gemini Adventure
description: Craft a unique story in a world of your own design. Describe the setting below, and let AI bring your adventure to life with dynamic narrative and visuals.
worldDescriptionPlaceholder: e.g., a neon-drenched cyberpunk city under constant rain
a1111EndpointHelp: Ensure your server is running with CORS enabled (e.g., `--cors-allow-origins=*`).
a1111ConfigHelp: Provide a base JSON object for the txt2img API. The 'prompt' from this object will be appended to the AI-generated prompt. Invalid JSON will be ignored and defaults will be used.
comfyuiEndpointHelp: e.g., http://127.0.0.1:8188. Ensure your server is running with CORS enabled (e.g., --enable-cors-header).
comfyuiWorkflowHelp: Paste the API format workflow. ##prompt## and ##negative_prompt## will be replaced. The number 1234567890 will be replaced with a random seed.
huggingFaceConfigHelp: Provide a JSON object for the Space's /infer API. The 'prompt' is added automatically. Keys with the value "delete" will be removed. Invalid JSON will be ignored and defaults will be used.
huggingFaceSpaceIdHelp: The ID of the image generation Space (e.g., 'black-forest-labs/FLUX.1-schnell').
huggingFaceTokenHelp: Optional. Required for private or gated Hugging Face Spaces.
safetyHelp: Adjusts how strictly the AI filters potentially sensitive content in the story.
saveErrorQuota: Save failed: Storage full. Please delete old saves.
apiKeyModalTitle: Enter Your Google AI API Key
apiKeyModalDescription: To begin your adventure, a Gemini API key is required. It will be saved securely in your browser's private file system for future sessions.
apiKeyGetLink: Get your API key from Google AI Studio
deleteAllDataWarning: This will permanently delete all save data, settings, and API keys. This action cannot be undone.
deleteAllDataConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all save data and settings? This action cannot be undone.
noteLink: A Note on Character and Content Safety
deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this save?
historyScreenDescription: These are the different conclusions and branching points of your adventure. Choose one to view its story or resume playing from that point.
chronicleDescription: The complete story leading to this point in your adventure.
exportFailed: Story export failed. Check the console for details.
